unnormalised: Entertainment: Is Bollywood's Newest Power Couple Heading for Splitsville?
normalised: Entertainment: Is Bollywood's Newest Power Couple Heading for Splitsville? Rumour mills are churning faster than a Lonavala chikki machine after whispers surfaced about trouble in paradise for Isha Sharma and Rohan Kapoor! Just months after their lavish Udaipur wedding on twenty second december two thousand and twenty three, sources are claiming the couple is "taking space." Apparently, Rohan's been spending late nights at film sets, reportedly not returning home until two A M some nights. Isha, meanwhile, was spotted having dinner with her old college friend, Vikram, at Mumbai's Bastian on tenth july two thousand and twenty four. A cosy dinner, some say! Adding fuel to the fire, Isha wasn't seen at Rohan's mother's birthday party on fourth july two thousand and twenty four - a big no-no in any good Bharatiya family! Her absence raised many eyebrows among the Bollywood elite. A close friend, speaking on condition of anonymity (as always!), mentioned that Rohan is focusing intensely on his upcoming action flick, needing a lot of "me time." Is that code for "we're on the rocks"? Only time will tell! We're keeping a close watch, folks!
